p: Serial two-fold dilutions of sera were prepared in 96 well flat-bottom plates in EMEM (Sigma-Aldrich) without FBS. 50 μL aliquots of serially diluted antibody were mixed with an equal volume of EMEM containing 200 TCID 50 of NiV-M, NiV-B, or HeV [ 49] and incubated for 30 min at 37 °C. 100 μL of Vero cell suspension containing 5 × 10 5 cells/mL were added, and the mixture was incubated at 37 °C in a CO 2 incubator for 72 h. CPE was scored microscopically and neutralization titers expressed as the reciprocal of the serum dilution that completely blocked CPE.
